    var key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse("bmpsZW1lbmcyMDE4MjAxNw==");

        iv: iv,

    });
    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));

function decrypt(data){
    var key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse("bmpsZW1lbmcyMDE4MjAxNw==");
    var iv = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse('MTIzNDU2NzgxMjM0NTY3OA==');

    var decryptedData = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(data, key, {
        iv: iv,
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC,
        padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7
    });
    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
id=result.match(/article_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
cid=result.match(/chapter_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
hash=result.match(/hash = "([\d\w]+)"/)[1];
tmp="https://www.92dus.com/home/index/ajaxchapter@id="+id+"&eKey="+hash+"&cid="+cid+"&basecid="+cid;
result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(tmp)).info.content
result=result.replace(/92读书网.*最快更新.*最新章节！/g,"").replace(/\(本章完\)/g,"").replace(/天才一秒记住本站.*最快更新!无广告！/g,"").replace(/看清爽的就到$/g,"").replace(/最新网址.*/g,"")
</js>

<js>
var D1 = '::', D2 = '
';
var link = 'https://m.ebtang.com/m/book/booklistJson?page={{page}}&rows=30&bookRoomOrderByType=6&sortType=&tagIds=&bookRoomWordType=-1&bookRoomUpdateType=-1&bookRoomVipType=-1&bookRoomFinishType=-1&randomString={{Date.now()}}';
var jdoc = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(link.replace('{{page}}', '1'))));
result = jdoc.categoryList.map(v => v.name + D1 + link.replace(/([?&]sortType=)[^?&]*/, '$1'+v.id));
result.unshift('🔹书库'+D1+link);
result = result.join(D2);
</js>

if (/\.google\.cn/.test(baseUrl)){ result = decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.+[&?]text=/, '')); } else{ var r = java.getString('id.randomString@value'); var link = baseUrl.replace(/^.*\/(\d+\/\d+)$/, 'https://m.ebtang.com/m/book/readbook/$1/more?randomString='+r); result = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(link))); result = result.bookChapter.content; } result = String(result).replace(/]{1,200}>/ig, '

');

<js>

result = /[?&]searchName/.test(baseUrl)
  ? jdoc.bookList.filter(v => v.name.includes(jdoc.searchName) || v.authorNick.includes(jdoc.searchName))
  : jdoc.bookList;
</js>

<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();



var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);

//还原屏蔽段落

content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~\[\];[A-Z]=\{___.*?[A-Z],\$__\$:\+\+[A-Z]}\;/,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z].*?\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/,"")



.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")

.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")

.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")

.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
.replace(/\('/,"")
.replace(/'\).*/,"")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/[A-Z]\._(.{4})/g,"%u$1");

密文=unescape(content)
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")

//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")

result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/防采集自动加载失败.*?浏览器！/,密文)

ruleContent.content:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)<\/div/)[1]).html();



var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);

//还原屏蔽段落

content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~\[\];[A-Z]=\{___.*?[A-Z],\$__\$:\+\+[A-Z]}\;/,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z].*?\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/,"")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\('/,"")
.replace(/'\).*/,"")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/[A-Z]\._(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
result=String(a+unescape(content));
result=result.replace(/防采集自动加载失败，点击手动加载，不支持阅读模式，请安装最新版浏览器！/,"")

</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var json=JSON.parse(result).Data;
var bid=json.BookId;
var base="https://m.qidian.com/book/"+bid+"/";

json.Chapters.slice(1).map(ch=>({
title:ch.N,
link:base+ch.C,
vip:ch.V,
time:java.timeFormat(ch.T)
}))
</js>

";>

	for (i in y) <

	>;result +=x;
	>;
f("male","[男]");f("female","[女]");f("epub","[出版]");

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var json=JSON.parse(result).all_book_items;
json.map(o=>({
    name:o.name,
    author:o.author,
    tags:[o.status,o.category].join(','),
 latest: String(o.lastChapterName).replace(/[\(（].*[求更谢乐发推].*[）\)]/,'')+String(java.timeFormat(Number(o.lastTime))).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'（$1）'),
    intro:o.desc,
    cover:o.imgUrl,
    catalogUrl:'/api/bookapp/bookSummary.m?sort=1&size=2147483647&returnType=100&gsort=1&cid=eef_easou_book&os=android&appverion=1070&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&ptype=4&gid='+o.gid+'&nid='+o.nid
})).filter(v =>v.name);
</js>

importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);
importClass(org.jsoup.Connection);

var url = baseUrl.split('?_=');
var params = '{'+decodeURIComponent(url[1].replace(/!/g, '"'))+'}';

var res = Jsoup.connect(url[0])
  .ignoreContentType(true)
  .userAgent(
    'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/55.0.2883.87 Safari/537.36'
  )
  .referrer(baseUrl)
  .header('Content-Type', 'application/json; charset=UTF-8')
  .requestBody(params)
  .method(Connection.Method.POST)
  .execute();

JSON.parse(String(res.body())).data.books;
</js>

}
list;
</js>
